languages.text: "Прославляю вашу мудрость, указавшую не пускать их в ульи под страхом смерти! Рассеявшись по пустошам, они могли вербовать лишь тамошних вандалов, и в самих ульях ячеек их культа совсем немного".

"Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."
languages.original_text: "Прославляю вашу мудрость, указавшую не пускать их в ульи под страхом смерти! Рассеявшись по пустошам, они могли вербовать лишь тамошних вандалов, и в самих ульях ячеек их культа совсем немного".

traits.locale_text: "Praise be to your wisdom that ordered to not let them into hives on pain of death! Scattering along the wastleands, they could only recruit the vandals dwelling there, and there are very few of the cult's cells positioned inside the hives."

"Praise be to your wisdom that ordered to not let them into hives on pain of death! Scattering along the wastleands, they could only recruit the vandals dwelling there, and there are very few of the cult's cells positioned inside the hives."

"Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

"Praise be! It was wise not to let them into hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells are positioned inside the hives."

"Praise be! It was wise not to let them into hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells are positioned inside the hives."

"Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

"Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

languages.text: “赞美黄金王座！您当时以死亡为威胁，阻止那些人进入巢都，这是个明智的决定！他们在废土中栖身，只能拉拢当地的引擎破坏者加入他们，这个邪教在众多巢都之中几乎完全失去了容身之处。”
languages.original_text: "Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

traits.locale_text: “赞美黄金王座！您当时以死亡为威胁，阻止那些人进入巢都，这是个明智的决定！他们在废土中栖身，只能拉拢当地的引擎破坏者加入他们，这个邪教在众多巢都之中几乎完全失去了容身之处。”
“赞美黄金王座！您当时以死亡为威胁，阻止那些人进入巢都，这是个明智的决定！他们在废土中栖身，只能拉拢当地的引擎破坏者加入他们，所有巢都几乎都没有这个邪教的容身之处。”

languages.text: «¡Gracias al Emperador! ¡Fue muy sabio no permitirles entrar en las colmenas so pena de muerte! En los páramos, solo podían reclutar a los vándalos que los habitaban, y el culto apenas consiguió establecer unas pocas células en las colmenas».
languages.original_text: "Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias al Emperador! ¡Fue muy sabio no permitirles entrar en las colmenas so pena de muerte! En los páramos, solo podían reclutar a los vándalos que los habitaban, y el culto apenas consiguió establecer unas pocas células en las colmenas».

languages.text: 「すばらしい！違反すると死刑に処すとの条件で奴らをハイヴに立ち入らせなかったのは賢明だった！急いでウエストランドに移動しても、そこに住む破壊者を集めることしかできず、しかも、ハイヴの中にはカルトのセルはほとんど配置されていない」
languages.original_text: "Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「すばらしい！違反すると死刑に処すとの条件で奴らをハイヴに立ち入らせなかったのは賢明だった！急いでウエストランドに移動しても、そこに住む破壊者を集めることしかできず、しかも、ハイヴの中には魔女団のセルはほとんど配置されていない」
「すばらしい！違反すると死刑に処すとの条件で奴らをハイヴに立ち入らせなかったのは賢明だった！急いでウエストランドに移動しても、そこに住む破壊者を集めることしかできず、しかも、ハイヴの中には魔女団のセルはほとんど配置されていない」

languages.text: « L'Empereur-Dieu soit loué ! C'était une sage décision de ne pas les laisser pénétrer dans les ruches sous peine de mort ! En errant dans les terres désolées, ils n'ont pu recruter que les Vandales qui y vivent. Ainsi, peu des cellules du culte ont pu être créées au sein des ruches. »
languages.original_text: "Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur-Dieu soit loué ! C'était une sage décision de ne pas les laisser pénétrer dans les ruches sous peine de mort ! En errant dans les terres désolées, ils n'ont pu recruter que les Vandales qui y vivent. Ainsi, peu des cellules du culte ont pu être créées au sein des ruches. »

languages.text: "Preiset den Imperator! Es war weise, sie unter Androhung der Todesstrafe nicht in die Makropolen zu lassen! Im Ödland konnten sie nur die dort lebenden Vandalen rekrutieren, und nur sehr wenige Zellen des Kultes konnten sich in den Makropolen formieren."
languages.original_text: "Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Preiset den Imperator! Es war weise, sie unter Androhung der Todesstrafe nicht in die Makropolen zu lassen! Im Ödland konnten sie nur die dort lebenden Vandalen rekrutieren, und nur sehr wenige Zellen des Kultes konnten sich in den Makropolen formieren."

"Preiset den Imperator! Es war weise, sie unter Androhung der Todesstrafe nicht in Makropolen zu lassen! Im Ödland konnten sie nur die Vandalen rekrutieren, die dort leben, und nur sehr wenige Zellen des Kults befinden sich in den Makropolen."

languages.text: "Şükürler olsun! Ölüm tehdidi altında olsalar da onları kovanlara almamak, mantıklı bir hareketti. Çorak topraklarda koşuşturup durarak yalnızca Vandalları saflarına katabildiler. Kovanların içinde ise çok az sayıda tarikat hücresi yer alıyor."
languages.original_text: "Praise be! It was wise not to let them into the hives on pain of death! Scurrying through the wastelands, they could only recruit the Vandals dwelling there, and very few of the cult's cells managed to form inside the hives themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Şükürler olsun! Ölüm tehdidi altında olsalar da onları kovanlara almamak, mantıklı bir hareketti. Çorak topraklarda koşuşturup durarak yalnızca Vandalları saflarına katabildiler. Kovanların içinde ise çok az sayıda tarikat hücresi yer alıyor."
